channel.title: I need some last minute help
channel.description:
I know this is a pain in the ass request but I'm on a time limit. Here is the situation:
Today is my last day at this job because I found another one that I start Monday. It is 12:00 PM Central time now and I need to have this site finished by 3. The only thing that I need help with is a page that will allow someone to upload a photo to a DB and another page to display it. It doesn't matter if it may be broken in a month or if it's even secure.
If anyone has the time to help with that much I would seriously appreciate it. I learned today why procrastination is bad :p
